=There are three possible ways to edit a task: =

==1.From the task list page==

To edit a task from this page follow these steps:

1. Make double click on the Assegnee column.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttEditTaskAssegnee.png" align="left" />

2. A Edit Task overlay shows up.


3. Enter the data you want to change and click on Save button.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttEditTaskSave.png" align="left" />

==2.From the task chart page with the Edit button==

To edit a task from this page follow these steps:

1. Select the task you want to edit.

<img src="http://projectforce.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Gantt/GanttEditTaskEditButton.png" align="left" />

2. Click on Edit button, enter the data you want to change and click on Save button.

==3.From the task chart page making double click on the task or milestone you want to edit==
